original_text: By faith Abel brought God a better offering than Cain did. By faith he was commended as righteous, when God spoke well of his offerings. And by faith Abel still speaks, even though he is dead.
korean_text: 믿음으로 아벨은 가인보다 더 나은 제사를 하나님께 드림으로 의로운 자라 하시는 증거를 얻었으니 하나님이 그 예물에 대하여 증언하심이라 그가 죽었으나 그 믿음으로써 지금도 말하느니라

sentences.original_text: By faith Abel brought God a better offering
sentences.korean_translation: 믿음으로 아벨은 하나님께 더 나은 제물을 드렸고

sentences.original_text: By faith he was commended as righteous
when God spoke well of his offerings
And by faith Abel still speaks
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 믿음으로 아벨은 여전히 말하고 있다
